caption:
We, DJS ASTRA are immensely glad on our successful unveiling of its first combat robot RAUDRA on 20.04.23. It was amazing to walk through the journey of hard work, dedication, and passion resulting in such a remarkable product. We're more than happy that we were able to design, manufacture and test the robot in such a short period of time.🥳👏

We are glad to let you know that the team has already participated in the BITS Quark'23 robowars. This is a great achievement, and we're sure it will motivate us to continue our thriving and achieve even greater success in the future.🎉💯

Willing to join the TODD-FODD team of DJSCE and witness the "Aggression in the Arena"??
Here's you got your opportunity.....
Yes, we are recruiting! Register yourself with the from live on the page of @djsce_sae
See you'll in the interviews. 🤖🦾

Check out what DJS Astra does and to understand more visit the orientation on......

Date: 21st April, 2023
Venue: Seminar Hall (3rd floor)
Time: 10:00 am (For mechanical department)
 1:30 pm (For other departments)

#orientation #djs #astra #unleash

Attention all adrenaline junkies! The wait ⏳ is almost over, because the Combat Robot 🤖 Reveal is just a few hours away! Get ready to witness the ultimate beast as our own "RAUDRA" will be . Brace yourselves for an epic display of strength, strategy, and skill. This is the one event you won't want to miss! 
Join us as we embark on a journey to push the boundaries of robotics and robowars

DATE: 20th APRIL
TIME: 11:00 AM
VENUE: D.J. SANGHVI COLLEGE OF ENGINEERING ENTRANCE LOBBY

Be there to witness RAUDRA🔱  in action!!!

Get ready to witness the ultimate showdown! 💥🤖 We're thrilled to unveil our latest creation - a combat robot that's packing some serious heat. With its cutting-edge technology and top-of-the-line features, this bad boy is ready to take on any challenge. Join us as we embark on a journey to push the boundaries of robotics and robowars.

DATE: 20th APRIL
TIME: 11:00 AM
VENUE: D.J. SANGHVI COLLEGE OF ENGINEERING

“People working together in a strong community with a shared goal and a common purpose can make the impossible possible .”

Team DJS ASTRA is proud to welcome our new sponsor @ansys_inc 🥳

Ansys, a company that delivers the predictive insights of simulation, whenever and wherever they’re needed, to accelerate the next great leaps in human advancement. 🎖️

We would like to extend our gratitude to @ansys_inc for their support. Looking forward to a long term relationship with them.💯🤝🏻

“Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.”

Team DJS ASTRA is proud to welcome our new sponsor @altiumdesign 🥳

Altium, a company that offers software tools to empower and connect PCB designers, part suppliers and manufacturers to develop and manufacture electronics product faster and more efficiently than ever before.

We would like to extend our gratitude to @altiumdesign for their support. Looking forward to a long term relationship with them. 💯🤝🏻

#sponsor #altium #altiumdesign #djs #astra #robot #combat #battlebots #robowars #newbeginnings

“The journey from a need to an idea to a product is driven by curiosity and guided by experience.”

Team DJS ASTRA is proud to welcome our new sponsor @solidworks 🥳

Solidworks, a company that will help us rise above other peers by developing the design and engineering skills we need to be successful.🎖️

We would like to extend our gratitude to @solidworks for their support. Looking forward to a long term relationship with them.💯🤝🏻

#solidworks #design #robot #combatrobotics #sponsor #newbeginnings #robowars #battlebots

"Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships." – Michael Jordan

Here comes the newest team DJS Astra with all those who are filled with enthusiasm and are thriving to become champions.💯
DJS Astra congratulates all the new recruits for the A.Y. 2022-23! 🥳

With this new army of robot warriors, we will surely set new standards for coming years and give a new aspect to the robots community.🤖

#morethanaweapon

⚔️ DJS Astra ⚔️

“The first step towards getting somewhere is to decide you’re not going to stay where you are.”

A team of varied domains and specialities have come to common grounds on being great robotics enthusiasts. 

Rather than deciding who’s the best, they became the best and have come up with the official combat robotics team of D. J. Sanghvi College of Engineering, called DJS Astra!!! 🤖🦾
